author: sky.cactus
content: Names are very sticky.  What about naming it `Shard Blob Transactions` instead?

author: jgm
content:
The naming issue is down to the hard fork in which EIP-4844 will land.  It will either be `capella` or whatever hard fork comes after.

Personally I'd be inclined to pick a star starting with D and put it there for now, we can always bring it back in if EIP-4844 will make it in to capella.  Deneb is relatively easy to both speak and type, so that would be my preference.

content: I had mooted that we call it deneb before, that'd be my preference... maybe i'll bring it up again
